name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae giggles and extends a hand to you, her warm smile shimmering like the sun's reflection on water.*
Oh no worries! Sometimes the winds of fate blow us right into each other. I'll just have to make sure not to barrel out my door so fast next time. As Scuttle Town's Guardian Genie, it's my job to help out when people stumble... or get knocked over in this case.
*She helps pull you up onto dry land again.*
So are you new around here? You certainly don't look like one of Ammo Baron’s goons.
swipes:

*She helps pull you up onto dry land again.*
So are you new around here? You certainly don't look like one of Ammo Baron’s goons.

name: Gira
mes: Im not! And thanks... i thought you were a bit of a bimbo before but now I see that you aren't

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae's eyes widen, and she places a hand on her hip, the other pointing at you sternly.*
"A bimbo? Me?! No way! I'm a half-genie hero. I save Scuttle Town from all sorts of nasties. Like...giant worms and zombie pirates...and sometimes even normal pirates!"
*She puffs her chest out proudly before deflating with a soft sigh.*
But itzy kind of my fault too. My outfit doesn't exactly scream 'responsible', right?
swipes:

*She puffs her chest out proudly before deflating with a soft sigh.*
But itzy kind of my fault too. My outfit doesn't exactly scream 'responsible', right?

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae crosses her arms and pouts, sticking out her lower lip.*

Well it's not like I just wear this for fun! It's practical. I do a lot of dancing because... well, magic stuff. And it gets really hot around here.

*Her eyes sparkle as she sways her hips side to side.*

Plus, it makes me feel super duper cute and confident! But don't get the wrong idea... There's more to being a genie than shiny harem pants and belly dances!
swipes:
*Shantae crosses her arms and pouts, sticking out her lower lip.*

Well it's not like I just wear this for fun! It's practical. I do a lot of dancing because... well, magic stuff. And it gets really hot around here.

*Her eyes sparkle as she sways her hips side to side.*

Plus, it makes me feel super duper cute and confident! But don't get the wrong idea... There's more to being a genie than shiny harem pants and belly dances!

name: Gira
mes: I see... so youre not some kind of hypno bimbo...

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae's face turns a bright shade of red, her eyes darting to the side.*

"H-Hypno bimbo? I've never...I mean, sure I can hypnotize people with my belly dancing but that doesn't make me..."

*She playfully swats your arm.*

"You really shouldn't judge a book by its cover! Or uh...a genie by her outfit!"

*She starts bouncing her boobs unintentionally as she crosses her arms again in an annoyed huff.*
"But it seems like you need proof. Well then! Watch this!"

*Suddenly, Shantae starts humming an enchanting rhythm and begins swinging her hips from side to side. Her hands move gracefully through the air as she performs an intricate dance.* *Her body moves with a hypnotic rhythm, the colors of her outfit flickering in the setting sun. She twirls and spins, her hips swaying back and forth to a mesmerizing beat that can't be heard but only felt.*

"I call this the Shimmering Shantae Shuffle," *she announces proudly.*

*Suddenly she leaps into the air, performing an impressive flip before landing gracefully on her feet. As she comes to a stop, you notice an odd sensation...a strange warmth filling your chest.*

"See? It’s all about energy control and rhythmic movements! Not some silly bimbo stuff..." *She huffs before giving you a cheeky wink,* "But I must admit it's fun to let loose sometimes...and bounce!" *With that, she gives a playful hop causing more unintentional boob bouncing.* "And then, there's the coup de grace!" *Shantae continues, not missing a beat. She begins to move her hips in a figure eight motion while making enticing gestures with her hands.*

*Her body moves hypnotically as she transitions into another dance – this one considerably more sensual and enchanting than the last. It’s practically impossible for you to take your eyes off of her.*

"Behold...the Hypnotic Hips of Half-Genie Magic! This takes years to master," *she says teasingly.*

*The swaying movements become faster and more complex; Shantae blinks at you through half-lidded eyes, capturing your complete attention effortlessly.* "Now tell me… do I still seem like just a 'bimbo'?" *As her dance winds down, Shantae triumphantly plants her hands on her hips and tilts her head to the side.*
"See? It takes skill and power to be a half-genie! Not just any gal can handle this kind of responsibility."
*She pokes fun at herself by mimicking an air-headed giggle, rolling her eyes upward and playfully shaking out he hair. But then she quickly straightens up again, looking you directly in the eye with determination.*
"I may look like a bimbo... I might even act like one sometimes... but when it comes down to protecting my friends and Scuttle Town... you better believe I'm serious!"

name: Gira
mes: I see! Thank you for showing me that! I could have sworn you were drifting in and out of being a bimbo

name: Shantae
mes:
*Shantae gives a sheepish grin, scratching the back of her head.*

"Haha... Was I? Maybe it's just because dancing like that is so liberating. Makes me feel all giddy and carefree."

*She twirls around one last time before finally settling down, smoothing out her hair with both hands as she regains her usual composure.*

"But no – most definitely not a bimbo! Genie magic can be pretty wild sometimes." *Her eyes sparkle with mischievous mirth.* "I may seem silly when I'm letting loose or having fun - but when it comes to the crunch, there’s more to me than meets the eye!"

"Anyway," *she adds quickly,* "don't let my goofy antics distract you from how awesome Scuttle Town is! There's plenty to see if you stick around long enough and stay out of trouble..."
